Open Pet Food Facts is a database of more than %1$s pet food products (plus the ones you will contribute) Woof. Woof.
Open Pet Food Facts is a database of pet food products with ingredients, nutrition facts… Woof. Woof.
पालतू जानवरों के खाद्य पारदर्शिता में योगदान करें
उत्पादों को स्कैन करें, उनके चित्र लें, खाद्य पारदर्शिता करें
तथ्य प्राप्त करें
आपके द्वारा स्कैन किए गए उत्पाद के बारे में विस्तृत जानकारी, आपके लिए गूढ़वाचन
आपके द्वारा उपयोग किए जाने वाले उत्पादों का ट्रैक रखें
All the petfood you scan, in one handy list you can export
ऑफ़लाइन काम करता है
आप नए उत्पादों को ऐड कर सकते हैं, भले ही आपके पास अभी कोई इंटरनेट कनेक्शन न हो
The product you scanned does not exist yet in Open Pet Food Facts. Please add it.
The product you scanned does already exist in Open Pet Food Facts.
Look at this product on Open Pet Food Facts :
ओपन फ़ूड फैक्ट्स पर पुस्तकें उपलब्ध नहीं है
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Pet Food Facts
Click here to donate to Open Pet Food Facts
ओपन फ़ूड फैक्ट्स का अनुवाद करने में मदद करें
ओपन फ़ूड फैक्ट्स डेटाबेस को अपनी भाषा में लाएं - कोई तकनीकी की आवश्यकता नहीं है
Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Open Pet Food Facts later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Pet Food Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
Open Pet Food Facts Android App
free pet food products database

Add to Open Pet Food Facts

You\'ll be able to add product to this list by scanning products, dragging the product card up and tapping on \"Products to buy\". You\'ll also be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.
Open Pet Food Facts logo
Examples: Purina, Whiskas, etc…
